name: chia-server-coin-cli
description: CLI for creating a server coin on the Chia Blockchain - Used for discovering Decentralized Internet Gateway Peers

scripts.prepare-binary: rm -rf build && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && tsc
scripts.create-win-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-win-x64 -o dist/server_coin.exe
scripts.create-mac-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-macos-x64 -o dist/server_coin
scripts.create-linux-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-linux-x64 -o dist/server_coin
scripts.create-linux-arm64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node18-linux-arm64 -o dist/server_coin

author: Michael Taylor
